HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Information is available on the 'Doprava a platba' page, which was not provided.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: up to 3 working days from order acceptance

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Information is available on the 'Doprava a platba' page, which was not provided.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Dr. Max offers home delivery and in-store pickup at their pharmacies. Information regarding parcel shops or lockers is not available in the provided Terms & Conditions.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery partners include DPD, Česká pošta, and PPL.
PRICING: Specific shipping costs, free shipping thresholds, and COD surcharges are not detailed in the T&C; this information is located on a separate 'Doprava a platba' (Shipping and Payment) page.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery is within 3 working days. Shipping is restricted to the Czech Republic.
NOTABLE FEATURES: No express or weekend delivery options are mentioned. In-store pickup is available across the Dr. Max pharmacy network.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The provided Terms & Conditions page contains only general shipping policies. Crucial details like pricing are absent, requiring users to visit another page ('Doprava a platba'), which was not available for this analysis. The information is therefore incomplete for a customer assessing shipping costs.
